An exhortation to charity (and a word of comfort) to the Irish Protestants being a sermon preached at Steeple in Dorsetshire, upon occasion of the collection for relief of the poor Protestants in this kingdom lately fled from Ireland / by Samuel Bold. Bold, S. (Samuel), 1649-1737.
36 p.
Printed for Awnsham Churchill, London : 1689.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
